channel.title: VIDEOSTORE - A Monster of the Week double feature
channel.description:
Hey all! My newest release, VIDEOSTORE has just gone live. It's two deluxe mysteries for Monster of the Week, including an expanded version of Gauntlet Hangouts favourite All Are Punished. If you like MOTW, 80s horror, and making fun of tech bros and incels, check it out!
https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/292991/VIDEOSTORE--A-Monster-of-the-Week-Double-Feature
![Cover%20-%20Itchio|595x500](upload://aUm0lLTDvWQwThmUnqwpNsUzZg2.jpeg)

item.title: VIDEOSTORE - A Monster of the Week double feature

Sounds amazing! MOTW is my FAVORITE rpg!
